trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around August 28th 2011
Summary: Ball of Light just out my window with a trail
divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up again around 2AM staring out my window AGAIN.... And there again I witnessed more strange lights. This was like a falling star I thought, except when I looked it was a ball of light that was descending down towards my window very low and it had a trail following after. It squirmed down towards my window like an eel in the air. It lasted only a few seconds and once again I am shocked and getting sort of worried. A few weeks before my daughter woke me up and said there was a buzzing noise over her bed like a wirily bird I went in and she could still here it but fading away but I never hear it. Lots of strange things here by LAX!
